abstract: Microsoft was ordered by a federal jury to pay $1.52 billion in a patent dispute over the MP3 format.
snippet: Microsoft was ordered by a federal jury to pay $1.52 billion in a patent dispute over the MP3 format.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft was ordered by a federal jury yesterday to pay $1.52 billion in a patent dispute over the MP3 format, the technology at the heart of the digital music boom. If upheld on appeal, it would be the largest patent judgment on record.

headline.main: MP3 Patents in Upheaval After Verdict
headline.print_headline: MP3 Patents In Upheaval After Verdict
